Comments_List: Semiconductor Fabrication skills, techniques, some key elements of integrated electronic circuits such as PN junction Diode, Schottky Diode, MOSFET.
Semiconductor device physics and fabrication skills of semiconductor devices.
Fundamental physics of semiconductor devices and fabrication skills of semiconductor devices based on silicon
The course is well organized. The lab sessions are really helpful.
Very specific and help us to  put what we learned into practice
It provides us a comprehensive understanding of semiconductor devices and it will be better if it consists of more advanced techniques in modern industry.
If anyone is interested in integrated electronics then this is a very helpful course.
Yes. It offers basic knowledge of the physics and fabrication skills of semiconductor devices based on silicon.
